open.title: Open acceptance of applications
open.description: Companies will be able to apply for onboarding to the vendor pool.

close.title: Close acceptance of applications
close.description: Acceptance of new applications will be terminated. Previously submitted applications are available for processing.

add_company.title: Add companies
add_company.sub_title: Add companies to expand the vendor pool

attraction_channels.title: Attraction channels
attraction_channels.tooltip: To configure the vendor pool widget, go to the public page section of the company profile. Find a widget and place it on your site

expiring_accreditations.title: Failed to get onboarding
expiring_accreditations.sub_title: Companies that have fail to get onboarding to the vendor pool

expire_soon.title: Onboarding status is expiring
expire_soon.sub_title: Onboarding status remains before the expiration date of less than 30 days

draft_card.title: Settings
draft_card.sub_title: Configure the vendor pool before publishing

settings.title: Description and parameters
settings.sub_title: Description and documents of the vendor pool, method and term of onboarding

questionnaire.title: Vendor pool questionnaire
questionnaire.sub_title: Section of the questionnaire, scoring, access to the application

access.title: User access
access.sub_title: Access to the vendor pool for user groups and their rights

errors.no_active_version: The vendor pool does not contain a valid profile
errors.no_active_formula: The questionnaire does not contain a scoring formula
errors.no_deferred_formula: The questionnaire that comes into force does not contain a scoring formula

refuse.title: Automatic rejection of applications to the vendor pool
refuse.text: Reject orders with scoring less than {{value}}

ranking.title: Ranking of companies in the vendor pool

empty.title: Automate the vendor pool
empty.subtitle: Use scoring to automatically reject applications and rank companies in the vendor pool

automation_turn_off.title: Disable automation
automation_turn_off.text: Disable automatic rejection of applications and ranking of companies in the vendor pool?

auto_reject.title: Automatic rejection of applications
auto_reject.checkbox: Enable automatic rejection of applications to the vendor pool
auto_reject.min_scoring: Reject applications with a score of less than
auto_reject.info: The setting is applied to new orders and does not affect previously submitted orders.
auto_reject.info_turned_off:
Automatic rejection of applications to the vendor pool is disabled.
Previously rejected applications will not be restored.

scoring.title: Ranking of companies in the vendor pool
scoring.checkbox: Enable ranking of companies in the vendor pool by category

info.true:
Ranking by category applies to companies whose claims contain a scoring.
Recalculating categories may take some time.
info.false: Ranking of companies in the vendor pool by category is disabled

error.title: Vendor pool automation not available
error.no_active_version:
The vendor pool does not contain a valid profile.
Set up and deploy a scoring questionnaire to automate the vendor pool.
error.no_active_formula:
The questionnaire does not contain a scoring formula.
Set up and deploy a scoring questionnaire to automate the vendor pool.
error.no_deferred_formula:
The questionnaire that comes into effect does not contain a scoring formula.
Set up a questionnaire scoring to automate the vendor pool.

empty.title: There are no groups with access to the vendor pool
empty.text: Give the groups access to the vendor pool to adjust the Onboarding Commission.

list.title: Stages of the Commission's work
list.notice: During the stage, the groups work simultaneously. The veto blocks the decision on the company's onboarding and terminates the work of the commission ahead of schedule

popup.title: Groups
popup.empty: There are no groups to add

decision.title: Decision on the company's onboarding to the vendor pool

new_version_dialog.title: Change questionnaire
new_version_dialog.description: Create a draft to change the questions, logic and scores in the new version of the questionnaire.
new_version_dialog.info: Access settings do not require creating a new version.

questionnaire_card.title: Vendor pool questionnaire
questionnaire_card.info: Set up the questionnaire and provide access to view companies requests.
questionnaire_card.no_groups: Access to the section for groups is not granted

add_group_popover.no_groups_info: Set up access for groups included in the onboarding committee

scoring.title: Scoring company assessment
scoring.subtitle: Calculate the scoring score of the company's application based on the results of the survey.

delete_block.title: Delete section
delete_block.info:
It will be impossible to restore the section.
Check the correctness of the calculation of the scoring score after deleting the section.

group.title: Delete group
group.text: The group and the questions it contains will be deleted. Move the questions to another group to save them.

object.title: Delete question
object.text: Confirm the deletion of the question.

validation.category_name: Specify the names of the categories
validation.category_scoring_range: Fill in the scoring scale, the numbers follow in descending order.

questionnaire_block.empty_info: Create the first section of the questionnaire section

default.notice: Vendor pool will be available to receive applications for onboarding.

Registry.ApprovalType.title: Method of inclusion to the vendor pool

Questionnaire.Deferred.NotExists.title: Questionnaire
Questionnaire.Deferred.NotExists.text: The vendor pool questionnaire has not been put into force. We recommend using the questionnaire to obtain detailed information about the applicant company.

Questionnaire.Active.NotExists.title: Questionnaire
Questionnaire.Active.NotExists.text: The vendor pool doesn't contain a questionnaire. We recommend using the questionnaire to obtain detailed information about the applicant company.

Questionnaire.Active.NoScoring.title: Questionnaire
Questionnaire.Active.NoScoring.text: The questionnaire does not contain a scoring formula. Set up the scoring formula.

Questionnaire.Deferred.NoScoring.title: Questionnaire
Questionnaire.Deferred.NoScoring.text: The questionnaire that comes into force does not contain a scoring formula. Set up the scoring formula.

Commission.NotExists.title: Onboarding Commission
Commission.NotExists.text: The onboarding commission has not been set up to consider applications for inclusion to the vendor pool.  Set up an onboarding commission or change method of inclusion to the vendor pool.

Questionnaire.Active.NotExists.title: Questionnaire
Questionnaire.Active.NotExists.text: The vendor pool doesn't contain a questionnaire. The onboarding commission examines the applicant's questionnaire when making a decision on onboarding.

Questionnaire.Active.NoScoring.title: Questionnaire
Questionnaire.Active.NoScoring.text: The questionnaire does not contain a scoring formula. Set up the scoring formula.

Questionnaire.Deferred.NoScoring.title: Questionnaire
Questionnaire.Deferred.NoScoring.text: The questionnaire that comes into force does not contain a scoring formula. Set up the scoring formula.

activate.title: Launch questionnaire
activate.from_date_snack: The questionnaire will come into force on the specified date

errors.common_error: The questionnaire section "{{value}}" contains configuration errors.
errors.formula_variable_not_found: The variable "{{value}}" was not found to calculate the scoring. Update the scoring formula.
errors.empty: The vendor pool questionnaire is not configured. Set up a questionnaire to receive advanced information about the applicant company.
errors.blocks_empty: The vendor pool questionnaire section "{{value}}" does not contain any questions. Customize the profile or delete the section.
errors.no_scoring: The questionnaire does not contain a scoring formula. Set up the scoring formula and put the questionnaire into action.

activate.fix_error: Correct any errors and retry the action.

delete_draft.title: Delete draft
delete_draft.text: It will be impossible to restore the draft of the questionnaire.

cancel_deferred.title: Cancel activation
cancel_deferred.text: The questionnaire will be transferred to the “Draft” status.

import_questionnaire.title: Upload questionnaire from file
import_questionnaire.text: Previously created sections and questions will be deleted.
import_questionnaire.success: The questionnaire from the file is loaded

errors.version: File "{{ file }}" contains an obsolete format. Use a new format. To do this, export the Questionnaire again and re-upload.
errors.format: File "{{ file }}" does not contain a Questionnaire. Select another file or export the Questionnaire again and re-upload.
errors.parsing: File "{{ file }}" is damaged. Export the Questionnaire again and re-upload.
errors.default: An error has occurred. Please try again or try again later. If the problem persists, contact technical support.
